000026.SZ.summary: FIYTA Precision Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in timepiece business primarily in China. It is involved in the designing, production, sale, import, and export of watches, driving units, watchcases, watchbands, and other spare and accessory parts; timepieces; general merchandise, jewelry, stationery articles, handicrafts, toys, diamonds, ornaments, and gifts; timing instruments; and hard materials, such as hard alloy and ceramics. The company also engages in the wholesale, retail, and repair of watches and components; distribution of leather wares, pens, ties, tie clips, electronic products, materials, instruments and meters, office equipment, and communication equipment; advertising business; and brand planning, property management, leasing, commerce, and investment activities. In addition, it offers conference services. The company was formerly known as FIYTA Holdings Ltd. and changed its name to FIYTA Precision Technology Co., Ltd. in December 2019. FIYTA Precision Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

000587.SZ.summary: Jinzhou Cihang Group Co., Ltd. engages in the processing, production, and sale of gold jewelry products in China and internationally. It also offers financial leasing services; and operates a pawnshop. The company was formerly known as Gold Leaf Jewelry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jinzhou Cihang Group Co., Ltd. in March 2016. Jinzhou Cihang Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Yichun, China.

002345.SZ.summary: GUANGDONG CHJ INDUSTRY CO.,LTD. engages in the design, development, manufacture, and retail of jewelry and fashion handbags under the CHJ Jewellery, VENTI, and FION brands in China. It operates approximately 1,000 franchised outlets. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Shantou, China.

002574.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Ming Jewelry Co., Ltd. researches, develops, designs, produces, and sells jewelry products in Mainland China. The company offers platinum, diamond, and gold jewelry. It offers its products through Ming brand, as well as online. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Shaoxing, China.

002721.SZ.long_name: Beijing Kingee Culture Development Co., Ltd.
002721.SZ.summary: Beijing Kingee Culture Development Co., Ltd. engages in the design, production, and sale of gold, jewelry, and other precious metal crafts in China. The company was formerly known as Beijing Kingee Culture Development Ltd. and changed its name Beijing Kingee Culture Development Co., Ltd. in July 2010. Beijing Kingee Culture Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002731.SZ.long_name: Shenyang Cuihua Gold and Silver Jewelry Co., Ltd.
002731.SZ.summary: Shenyang Cuihua Gold and Silver Jewelry Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, wholesale, retail, and franchise of jewelry in China. Its products include gold, platinum, diamonds, jade, etc. The company was formerly known as Shenyang Cuihua Gold and Silver Jewelry Products Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenyang Cuihua Gold and Silver Jewelry Co., Ltd. in July 2008. Shenyang Cuihua Gold and Silver Jewelry Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Shenyang, China.

002867.SZ.long_name: Chow Tai Seng Jewellery Co., Ltd.
002867.SZ.summary: Chow Tai Seng Jewellery Co., Ltd. provides jewelry in China. It also provides diamond mosaic products. In addition, the company offers gold jewelry, as well as platinum, karat gold, jadeite, pearl, and others. It sells its products through franchise, self-operated stores, and e-commerce. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Shenzhen, China. Chow Tai Seng Jewellery Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shenzhen Zhoushi Investment Co., Ltd.

1815.HK.summary: CSMall Group Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the design and sale of gold, silver, gem-set, and other jewelry products in the People's Republic of China. It offers gold bars, silver bars, and silverware; processes and wholesales precious metal products; operates self-owned stores; develops software; develops properties; and plans cultural events. The company sells its jewelry products through online sales channels; offline retail and service network; and third-party offline points of sale. As of December 31, 2020, it had 98 CSmall Shops located in 25 provinces and municipalities comprising 4 self-operated CSmall Shops and 94 franchised CSmall Shops, as well as 17 television and video shopping channels. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

200026.SZ.summary: FIYTA Precision Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in timepiece business primarily in China. It is involved in the designing, production, sale, import, and export of watches, driving units, watchcases, watchbands, and other spare and accessory parts; timepieces; general merchandise, jewelry, stationery articles, handicrafts, toys, diamonds, ornaments, and gifts; timing instruments; and hard materials, such as hard alloy and ceramics. The company also engages in the wholesale, retail, and repair of watches and components; distribution of leather wares, pens, ties, tie clips, electronic products, materials, instruments and meters, office equipment, and communication equipment; advertising business; and brand planning, property management, leasing, commerce, and investment activities. In addition, it offers conference services. The company was formerly known as FIYTA Holdings Ltd. and changed its name to FIYTA Precision Technology Co., Ltd. in December 2019. FIYTA Precision Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

200168.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Jadiete Holdings Group Company Limited
200168.SZ.summary: Guangdong Jadiete Holdings Group Company Limited sells gold and other jewelry in China. The company operates through a chain of jewelry stores, as well as through the Internet under the Chinese Gold Nobility brand. It also trades in nickel metals. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Rieys Group Company Ltd. and changed its name to Guangdong Jadiete Holdings Group Company Limited in May 2016. The company is based in Shenzhen, China. Guangdong Jadiete Holdings Group Company Limited is a subsidiary of Shenzhen Shenghengchang Huifu Industrial Co., Ltd.

300945.SZ.summary: MCLON JEWELLERY Co.,Ltd. offers fashion jewelry in China and internationally. The company primarily provides hangings, diamond rings, bracelets, earrings, necklaces, ear ornaments, pendants, and bangles. It sells its products through shopping mall counters and online shops. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

600612.SS.summary: Lao Feng Xiang Co., Ltd. operates in the jewelry industry in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It researches, develops, designs, produces, and sells gold, silver, platinum, diamonds, jade, pearls, gold inlays, colored gemstones, enamel, red coral, and other jewelry, as well as dental carvings, K gold glasses, and travel craft souvenirs. The company was formerly known as China First Pencil Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Lao Feng Xiang Co., Ltd. in July 2009. Lao Feng Xiang Co., Ltd. was founded in 1848 and is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

603900.SS.summary: Leysen Jewellery Inc. sells jewelry products in China. The company was formerly known as Tesiro Jewelry Inc. Leysen Jewellery Inc. was founded in 1999 and is based in Nanjing, China.

JSBL.long_name: JS Beauty Land Network Technology Inc.
JSBL.summary: JS Beauty Land Network Technology Inc. engages in the retail and wholesale of jade stone-adorned jewelry and decorations in China. The company was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.
